results.name: Trajectory of 48 under the map x -> A289667(x).
link: Chai Wah Wu, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..121
mathematica: NestList[FromDigits[#, 3] &@ Flatten@ Map[IntegerDigits[#, 3] &, FactorInteger[#] /. {p_, e_} /; p > 0 :> If[e == 1, p, {p, e}]] &, 48, 27] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Jul 29 2017 *)
